name: Volunteer Heart
description:
Become a volunteer and help the village elders during the pandemic crisis. Bring food, medicine and water to their homes.

The game encorauges you to keep social distancing and  wash your hands to prevent the spread of COVID-19, and above all to be solidary :)

Control the player by pressing the arrow keys or by left-clicking with the mouse

This is a game for the #1 StaySafe! Jam.

Made it with mosi. A tiny game engine.  

Get the source code.
